title: First aid: everyday emergencies
brief_description: Describes treatment for snakebite; poison taken internally; poison ivy, oak and sumac; chemical in the eye; soft and hard foreign matter in the eye; foreign object in the nose; bug or insect in the ear; something stuck in the throat; splinters; blisters; faintness; artificial respiration, back-pressure armlift method; carbon monoxide poisoning and electric shock.
